response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, is valued at $1,000,000 by you, and it holds an even greater significance for us due to its unique features and benefits. We are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to recognize your early interest and commitment to innovation in your industry. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
